channel.title: ~~[317] BloodxScape [317]~~ Working Claw Spec, PvP Armour Added~and much more!
channel.description:
[center]Hey All, I've made a new 317 server.[/center] [center]i'll show you some pics and features[/center] [center]I Hope you guys like it :D[/center]
[center][u]Features ![/u][/center] [center]-Pest Control[/center] [center]-Bandos Godwars[/center] [center]-Farming Added[/center] [center]-Custom Skill Area's[/center] [center]-Mod & Admin Area's[/center] [center]-Full Working Gs stances[/center] [center]-D claws + Full working emote[/center] [center]-All PvP Armour Added[/center] [center]-King Black Dragon[/center] [center]-Full working slayer skill[/center] [center]-Dark bow added + working spec[/center] [center]-Edgeville Is Home[/center] [center]-Training @ Rock Crabs[/center] [center]-Daggonoth kings[/center] [center]-Barbarian Assault[/center] [center]-Barrows Brothers drop Barrows[/center] [center]-Working Fight pits[/center] [center]-Working Ancient[/center] [center]-Lunar spells[/center] [center][/center] [center]Much more but you have to look for yourself :D[/center]
[center]~~~~Commands~~~~[/center] [center]---Players commands---[/center] [center]::Players - Shows Players online[/center] [center]::Yell - Yell to everyone in the message box[/center] [center]::changepassword (new pass) - Changes your password[/center] [center]::shops - Teleports you to shop[/center]
[center]---Skill Commands---[/center] [center]::woodcut - Teleports to wc area and gives Axe[/center] [center]::fletch - Teleports to Wc area and gives knife[/center] [center]::firemaking - Teleports to Firemaking Area And gives Tinderbox[/center] [center]::farming - Teleports to Farming patch[/center] [center]::agility - Teleports to agility area[/center] [center]::Fishing - Teleports to fish area and gives needed stuff[/center] [center]::runecrafting - Teleports to Runecrafting altars ( abyss )[/center] [center]::Thieving - Teleports To Thieving area A.K.A Home :P[/center] [center]::cooking - Teleports to cooking area[/center]
[center]So Now its time for some pics :D[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/50gu42.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/11bn11v.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Claw Special working ![/center] [center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2hpqbef.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2zptba1.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Working Godsword Stances[/center] [center][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/mtmmw5.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Most Specs Work[/center] [center][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/wjcmy8.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]PvP Armour Working[/center] [center][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2s1p53r.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Dragonfire Shield Smithing[/center] [center][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2cf46lc.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Shops[/center] [center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/294j576.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Moderator Area[/center] [center][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/334oi11.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Donator Area[/center] [center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2coo8cg.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Administrator Area[/center] [center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/fu73g3.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]All Commands[/center] [center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/jqszet.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/j7xlya.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/fc1k47.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/11sgpon.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]King Black Dragon[/center] [center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/6rnfaq.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]General Graardor[/center] [center][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/fozo14.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Lol This is when i made myself 957 in every cb skill :P[/center] [center][IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/34eysk6.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]I Really hope you like my server[/center]
[center]First 2 To Join Will become Admin[/center]
[center]If Admin Spots are zero, first 3 to join will become Mod[/center]
[center]Download: http://uppit.com/v/823V54OP[/center] [center]I Hope to see you guys on the server :D[/center]
[center][u]~~Blindskills~~[/u][/center]

Attention you fucktards, he said he hopes to see you on his server. He’s not advertising and theirs a download link at the bottom. so GF! But dude, EXCELLENT work! I intend on using this as a base for my next project ;D I’ll give you credit don’t worrk

No need to get your panties in a bunch Nancy.

item.title: ~~[317] BloodxScape [317]~~ Working Claw Spec, PvP Armour Added~and much more!
item.dc:creator: @blindskills blindskills
item.description:
@blindskills wrote:

[center]Hey All, I’ve made a new 317 server.[/center]
[center]i’ll show you some pics and features[/center]
[center]I Hope you guys like it :D[/center]

[center]Features ![/center]
[center]-Pest Control[/center]
[center]-Bandos Godwars[/center]
[center]-Farming Added[/center]
[center]-Custom Skill Area’s[/center]
[center]-Mod & Admin Area’s[/center]
[center]-Full Working Gs stances[/center]
[center]-D claws + Full working emote[/center]
[center]-All PvP Armour Added[/center]
[center]-King Black Dragon[/center]
[center]-Full working slayer skill[/center]
[center]-Dark bow added + working spec[/center]
[center]-Edgeville Is Home[/center]
[center]-Training @ Rock Crabs[/center]
[center]-Daggonoth kings[/center]
[center]-Barbarian Assault[/center]
[center]-Barrows Brothers drop Barrows[/center]
[center]-Working Fight pits[/center]
[center]-Working Ancient[/center]
[center]-Lunar spells[/center]
[center][/center]
[center]Much more but you have to look for yourself :D[/center]

[center]Commands[/center]
[center]—Players commands—[/center]
[center]::Players - Shows Players online[/center]
[center]::Yell - Yell to everyone in the message box[/center]
[center]::changepassword (new pass) - Changes your password[/center]
[center]::shops - Teleports you to shop[/center]

[center]—Skill Commands—[/center]
[center]::woodcut - Teleports to wc area and gives Axe[/center]
[center]::fletch - Teleports to Wc area and gives knife[/center]
[center]::firemaking - Teleports to Firemaking Area And gives Tinderbox[/center]
[center]::farming - Teleports to Farming patch[/center]
[center]::agility - Teleports to agility area[/center]
[center]::Fishing - Teleports to fish area and gives needed stuff[/center]
[center]::runecrafting - Teleports to Runecrafting altars ( abyss )[/center]
[center]::Thieving - Teleports To Thieving area A.K.A Home :P[/center]
[center]::cooking - Teleports to cooking area[/center]

[center]So Now its time for some pics :D[/center]

[center][/center]

[center]

[/center]
